name: MicroSailing
overview: MicroSailing is a 1 - 2 player sailing game for the 8-bit Atari computer. The player controls a small sailing vessel, which they must navigate past a number of pylons in the order demonstrated by a lead vessel. The player must then chart this course, while dealing with changing wind conditions. The first player to chart the correct course is the winner. Players can choose standard or advanced rules, as well as clear or stormy weather.
